channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Lync
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Lync

item.title: CVE-2018-8474|2024-08-05T06:54:36.655Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20lync
item.description: A security feature bypass vulnerability exists when Lync for Mac 2011 fails to properly sanitize specially crafted messages, aka "Lync for Mac 2011 Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Lync.
